    • initialize

      public void initialize​(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url -
      resourceBundle - Initializes class filling maillist, setting header text and invoking refresh method, in order to update list of mail

    • initModel

      public void initModel​(Inbox inbox)
      Parameters:

    • getBorderPane

      public javafx.scene.layout.BorderPane getBorderPane()
      Returns:
      border pane panel of view

    • newMail

      public void newMail()
      Method invoked by write mail button directly in FXML, loads new view, hooks controller to view and initializes controller field inherited by this controller, used to write a new mail

    • printReceived

      public void printReceived()
      Method invoked by FXML directly when pressed on a mail, in order to view it. It minimizes box to side view, gets selected mail, loads and sets new view, hooks controller to view and initializes controller model with inherited model

    • deleteMail

      public void deleteMail() throws IOException, ExecutionException, InterruptedException
      Throws:
      IOException
      ExecutionException
      InterruptedException - Method invoked by FXML when button delete pressed, gets email received and invokes model method to delete mail

    • logout

      public void logout() throws IOException, ExecutionException, InterruptedException
      Throws:
      IOException
      ExecutionException
      InterruptedException - Method invoked by FXML when logout button is pressed, invokes model logout method and then closes application
